title: Full moon dates for 2019, including October's Hunter's Moon
text:
Dust off those binoculars and keep your eyes on the skies, as the tenth full moon of 2019 is fast approaching.

As one of 12 full moons to admire every year, October's moon was dubbed the Hunter's Moon by early Native Americans because it was the ideal time for hunting.

But when and how can you see it? Here we've compiled a complete guide to our moon, Earth's only natural satellite and the largest and brightest object in our night sky which has enchanted and inspired mankind for centuries.

From supermoon to blue moon, here's everything explained in one place.

How often does a full moon occur?

A full moon occurs every 29.5 days and is when the Moon is completely illuminated by the Sun's rays. It...
description: For the stargazers out there, we have compiled a complete list of dates for every full moon in 2019.
